original_text: You shall remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you power to get wealth, that he may confirm his covenant that he swore to your fathers, as it is this day.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와를 기억하라 그가 네게 재물 얻을 능력을 주셨음이라 이같이 하심은 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 언약을 오늘과 같이 이루려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: You shall remember the Lord your God
for it is he who gives you power to get wealth
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 네게 재물을 얻을 능력을 주심이라

sentences.original_text: that he may confirm his covenant
that he swore to your fathers
